titleInfo.title: Letter, Howard Hopkins in LaGrange, Tenn. to Abbie Watson in Clyde, Wayne County, N.Y., 1864 January 17

mods.abstract: In this letter, dated January 17, 1864 at LaGrange, Tenn., Howard Hopkins of the 3rd Regiment Michigan Calvary writes to his cousin Abbie Watson in Clyde, Wayne County, N.Y. He discusses general news, hopes for returning home, a possible move with his Division to Texas and whether he will re-enlist or not. He says, "...untill those men in the North does do sompthing I shall not enlist again."
